text: "Somethin' Stupid" is a ballad written by C. Carson Parks. It was recorded in 1966 by Parks and his wife Gaile Foote. The song is best known for being recorded by Frank Sinatra and his daughter Nancy. The Sinatras' version became popular as it spent four weeks at the #1 spot on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was also recorded by Tammy Wynette, The Lennon Sisters, Marvin Gaye, Robbie Williams and Nicole Kidman and many others. == Outer links == * Something stupid - Frank & Nancy Sinatra (1967) at YouTube Category:1967 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop songs Category:Pop ballads Category:Frank Sinatra songs Category:Nancy Sinatra songs Category:Tammy Wynette songs Category:Marvin Gaye songs Category:Robbie Williams songs
title: Somethin' Stupid
